di_monitor.name: di_monitor
di_monitor.description: This app monitors a digital input. It shows the state of the DI and sends notifications when the alarm is triggered. It will also tell you the duration of the last triggered event.

di_name.title: DI Name
di_name.description: The name of the Digital Input to monitor

di_channel.title: DI Channel
di_channel.description: The channel of the Digital Input to monitor

di_triggered_state.title: DI Triggered State
di_triggered_state.description: The state of the Digital Input to monitor, rising or falling for a digital input, or VI+ or VI- for an analog input

send_triggered_alert.title: Send Triggered Alert
send_triggered_alert.description: Whether or not to send an alert when the Digital Input is triggered

send_untriggered_alert.title: Send Untriggered Alert
send_untriggered_alert.description: Whether or not to send an alert when the Digital Input is untriggered

alert_message.title: Alert Message
alert_message.description: The message to send when the Digital Input is triggered

alert_complete_message.title: Alert Complete Message
alert_complete_message.description: The message to send when the Digital Input is untriggered

voltage_state.title: Voltage State
voltage_state.description: The voltage state of the Digital Input

show_triggered_count.title: Show Triggered Count
show_triggered_count.description: Whether or not to show the triggered count

show_triggered_duration.title: Show Triggered Duration
show_triggered_duration.description: Whether or not to show the triggered duration

show_last_triggered_duration.title: Show Last Triggered Duration
show_last_triggered_duration.description: Whether or not to show the last triggered duration

show_last_triggered_time.title: Show Last Triggered Time
show_last_triggered_time.description: Whether or not to show the last triggered time

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.description: Timezone for displaying the last triggered time (e.g. Australia/Sydney, America/New_York)

position.title: Position
position.description: The position of the pump monitor app in the UI. Smaller is higher, larger is lower. 100 is the default position of most apps.

stacked.title: Stacked
stacked.description: Whether or not to stack the app in the UI. If True, the elements of the app will appear outside of a container. If False, the elements of the app will appear inside a container.
